com: breakthrough! Hales picks out midwicket. A short ball from Marsh, Hales latches on but pinged it straight to Watson. A bit of a giveaway from Hales.

steps away and drives, in the air... and taken at point! Maxwell has got Roy, slicing a shot straight to the fielder. Might have skidded on a bit as he was trying to force the ball over the off side - maybe an unnecessary risk, with singles coming regularly, but that's the game and Roy's a goner

angling in, swipes across the line - and bowled 'im! Taylor advanced at the bowler again, played around a straight one and it clattered into the top of middle and leg. He falls for an industrious 49 and the pressure goes up another notch
he finds midwicket! Not Stokes' most convincing innings. A full delivery, angled into the pads, and he flicks it straight to Joe Burns...silence around the ground
huge moment! He's gloved it down the leg side going for the pull. The ball was there for the shot, short and outside leg stump, but it just glanced the glove through to Wade

but he's gone now! England falling away. Full outside off, Buttler goes for the drive and just picks out mid-off inside the circle. That was loose from Buttler, needed to at least take a moment to assess after Morgan's departure

he's on a hat-trick! Short, angled down the leg side, Woakes goes for a paddle-turned-pull and gets a very thin glove through to Wade. One glove down the leg side can be unlucky, but two in four balls?
regulation stuff, full outside off, nicked to the keeper...Starc came round the wicket and there's just a hint of it moving away from Rashid as he drives. Neat, low catch

and that's just about that! The short ball does the trick. Got fed up feeding Moeen's drive, went short and it's worked. Moeen goes for the pull, comes off the toe end, goes high but not very far and midwicket settles underneath it
that's all over! Finn misses a wild swing to leg and Cummins was straight. Job done.
